summary: Passionate Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Strong background in Python, React, and cloud technologies. Looking for challenging roles in fast-paced startups.

projects.name: Smart Resume Analyzer
projects.description:
Built an NLP-based resume parser using spaCy and Python that extracts skills, education, and experience. Deployed on AWS Lambda with a React frontend. Used BERT embeddings for job-resume matching.
Technologies: Python, spaCy, React, AWS Lambda, DynamoDB

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description:
Full stack e-commerce app with payment integration, inventory management, and real-time order tracking.
Technologies: Next.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, Stripe API, Docker

projects.name: CERTIFICATIONS
projects.description:
AWS Certified Developer – Associate (2023)
Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer (2022)

achievements:
Winner – Smart India Hackathon 2022 (National Level)
Google Summer of Code 2021 Contributor
Dean's Merit List – IIT Delhi 2019, 2020, 2021
